meaningMnemonic: A <radical>tsunami</radical> is coming so you take your two <radical>wolverines</radical> and your <radical>turkey</radical> out for a <kanji>wash</kanji>. It's the only way you can get them clean at once without the wolverines fighting over the turkey and somebody getting hurt. The tsunami is big enough to wash them all before anything bad happens.
readingMnemonic: Once they're nice and <kanji>wash</kanji>ed you need to subdue them by poking each of them with a <reading>tack</reading> (たく). The tack has special sleeping medicine on it, so once they're nice and clean you can put them back in their cages without them trying to eat each other.
